thread.title: It's all going wrong for some NFL slumpers
thread.title_full: It's all going wrong for some NFL slumpers

author: senh
title: It's all going wrong for some NFL slumpers
text: BING NEWS: Colts were right to go for it, wrong to use trick play The film never lies, and Sunday night's film shows a Colts team that tried to get too smart and too cute at the worst possible time. Story The Colts try to get too cute, and it ends up costing them seven points and any chance to end their six-game losing ... 10/19/2015 - 7:42 am | View Link It's all going wrong for some NFL slumpers There are slumps in the NFL, and there are SLUMPS. Sure, the Jaguars, Titans, Browns, Bears and Redskins have poor records so far. That was pretty much expected. What is going on in Seattle, Baltimore, Kansas City and Detroit, those are major flops so far. 10/19/2015 - 7:41 am | View Link What’s really wrong with the Seahawks? They’re just not as good This team used to inspire fear in its foes — now it just inspires hope. Since 1990, only 14 of the 168 NFL teams that have begun the year 2-4 have made the playoffs. That’s 8.3 percent. And while some might say that it’s different with the Hawks ... 10/19/2015 - 7:36 am | View Link Colts' fake punt goes horribly wrong; Pats take advantage The Colts ran quite possibly the most baffling special teams play of all-time on Sunday night. NFL via Twitter The Indianapolis Colts tried to catch the Patriots off guard Sunday night with a fake punt late in the third quarter, but New England wasn’t ... 10/19/2015 - 7:23 am | View Link How the Colts' trick play went wrong and why it could have worked What if we're about to get burned on the most embarrassing deep throw in NFL history? How pissed is Coach going to be if we assume this is a run that cannot possibly succeed and then the Colts manage to this this pass? That internal doubt can be the ...
